Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs and goals. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible deal while maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
